name: Synthwave Drive 80's
description:
Listening to Synthwave most people have had this feeling of nostalgia for an era they didn't know or that never existed.
The Synthwave Drive 80's is very much inspired by the '80s, but is mostly an idealized futuristic version of the '80s.

Synthwave Drive 80's has a unique style, it has a gradient from black to white. 

In Synthwave Drive 80's you will first start with one car but soon will be other cars which you will be able to upgrade or buy other cars with the money earned at the end of each run. Soon you will be able also to race your car through different unique worlds!

Watch out for other vehicles on the road (yes, even in the future there will be traffic).

Features:

+ A unique retro-futuristic atmosphere!

+ Different synthwave musics!

+ Unique style in this genre!

+ Addictive gameplay!
